title: How to load thunderbird email onto a mobile phone
content: I have an account with the messaging company and use thunderbird for my emails on a desktop computer, how can I use my mobile phone to send/ receive emails to the same address?.
creator: 2harmony

title: The "send" tab is no longer as a action choice.  How do choose to SEND email?
content: The "send" tab is no longer as a action choice. How do choose to SEND email?
